I OBJECT MY IDEA TO HAVE ONE OF THE MAJOR FACTIONS
CAPTURE AND HAVE A TRIAL FOR A WELL KNOWN ENEMY BOT IS
BEING DISCRIMINATED! AND DON'T SAY I DIDN'T MENTION IT
BECAUSE I DID! (By the way I think we should also
bring back The Nemasis and have every faction try to
capture it).

--- nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com wrote:
> 
> Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created
> for the 
> nbwrpg group:
> 
> What would be the best option to save 
> this RPG? 
> 
>   o More Players 
>   o Add this RPG to more searching reasurces. 
>   o More contests. 
>   o Improve the Story line. 
>   o Improve the currents rules 
>   o More characters 
>   o All above 
>   o Do a meeting in order to get more ideas 
> (including above) 
> 
> 
> To vote, please visit the following web page:
> 
> http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 
> 
> Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll
> votes are 
> not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the
> Yahoo! Groups 
> web site listed above.
> 
> Thanks!
> 
>  
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
